Image.Alt: A group of scouts standing looking towards a woman writing something on a whiteboard on wheels.
Image.Caption: The scouts from Troop 53 are towards the back on the right in red sweatshirts.

Image.Alt: Picture of a firetruck that says 'GREENPORT PUMPER CO. NO. 1 EST. 1927'. There are several scouts looking at it, with three scouts from Troop 53 on the left of the photo. The three scouts are wearing their class B hoodies.
Image.Caption: The scouts from Troop 53 are on the left, in red sweatshirts that say '53' on the backs.
